assignments.name: SetHideAppointmentModeSelectionOptionsFalse
assignments.label: Set Hide Appointment Mode Selection Options Variable

assignments.name: SetHideAppointmentModeSelectionOptionsTrue
assignments.label: Set Hide Appointment Mode Selection Options Variable

assignments.description: Sets the flow’s current stage to SelectGroupAppointmentDetailsStage, and sets AppointmentCategory to the appointment mode of the service appointment.
assignments.name: SetStageToSelectGroupAppointmentDetails
assignments.label: Set Stage to Select Group Appointment Details

choices.description: Stores the choice label and value for the Group Appointment Access Type option on the ScreenSelectGroupServiceAppointmentDetails screen.
choices.name: ChoiceUsersAddedAsAttendees

choices.description: Stores the choice label and value for the Group Appointment Access Type option on the ScreenSelectGroupServiceAppointmentDetails screen.
choices.name: ChoiceUsersAddedAsAttendeesAndExperienceSiteUsers
choices.choiceText: Added and Community Users

constants.description: Stores the value that indicates that the AddOrModifySvcApptAttendees flow is invoked and the service appointment attendee enrollment summary is shown on the parent flow’s confirmation screen.
constants.name: CompositeMode

constants.description: Stores the value that indicates that the service appointment mode is Group.
constants.name: Group

constants.description: Stores the value that indicates that the service appointment mode is Regular.
constants.name: Regular

decisions.description: Determines whether to display the service appointment mode selection options by checking if appointmentMode is either Group or Regular.
decisions.name: DisplayServiceAppointmentModeSelectionOptions
decisions.label: Display Service Appointment Mode Selection Options?

decisions.description: Determines whether the Add Attendees to Service Appointment checkbox is selected on the ScreenSelectGroupServiceAppointmentDetails screen.
decisions.name: IsAddAttendeesCheckboxSelected
decisions.label: Is Add Attendees Checkbox Selected?

decisions.description: Determines if the service appointment mode is Group.
decisions.name: IsServiceAppointmentModeGroup
decisions.label: Is Service Appointment Mode Group?

rules.name: FindResourceDisableMrAndCsFalse
rules.label: Find Resource Disable MR and CS False

rules.name: FindResourceDisableMrAndCsTrue
rules.label: Find Resource Disable MR and CS True

rules.name: Find_Service_Resource_for_Anonymous_Booking
rules.label: Find Service Resource for Anonymous Booking

screens.description: Allows the flow user to select group appointment details, such as attendee limit and group appointment access type.
screens.name: ScreenSelectGroupServiceAppointmentDetails
screens.label: Select Group Service Appointment Details

fields.name: SelectGroupServiceAppointmentDetailsHeader
fields.fieldText: Select Group Service Appointment Details

fields.name: AttendeeLimit
fields.helpText: Enter a value from 1 through {!MaximumAttendeeLimit}

validationRule.errorMessage: Enter a value from 1 through {!MaximumAttendeeLimit}

fields.name: CheckboxAddAttendees
fields.fieldText: Add Service Appointment Attendees to Service Appointment

stages.description: Stores the label and order for the stage where the flow user enters the group appointment details. This label is displayed on the progress bar when the user runs this flow.
stages.name: SelectGroupAppointmentDetailsStage
stages.label: Select Group Appointment Details

subflows.description: Calls a sub-flow that adds, modifies, or deletes service appointment attendee records for a group service appointment.
subflows.name: AddOrModifyAttendees
subflows.label: Add or Modify Attendees

variables.description: Stores a value that indicates the appointment category of the service appointment.
variables.name: AppointmentCategory

variables.description: Stores the appointment mode selected for the service appointment.
variables.name: appointmentMode

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: Stores the developer name of the email template that’s sent to the service appointment attendee for enrollment or unenrollment.
variables.name: EmailTemplate

variables.description: The ID of the selected Engagement Channel Type.
variables.name: engagementChannelTypeId

variables.description: Specify a comma-separated list of service resource IDs. Depending on the page, these IDs are used to filter work type groups, service territories, or service resources.
variables.name: FilterByResourceIds

variables.description: Stores a boolean value that indicates whether to display or hide the appointment mode selection options.
variables.name: HideAppointmentModeSelectionOptions

variables.description: Specify whether to display ST OH or not
variables.name: hideStOh

variables.description: Stores the maximum number of attendees who can be added to a group appointment.
variables.name: MaximumAttendeeLimit

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName

variables.description: Stores the prefix for the URL that opens the page that allows the flow user to unenroll from the service appointment.
variables.name: UnenrollUrlPrefix
